title: Paleo Hot Chocolate with Coconut Whipped Cream
directions: *Be sure to chill your can of coconut cream in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours before making the whipped cream.
1. For the hot chocolate: Heat milk in a large saucepan and bring to a boil.
2. Once milk is boiling, remove from heat and stir in cocoa and vanilla; stir until everything is combined and pour hot chocolate into desired cup or mug.
3. For the whipped cream: Remove coconut cream from the refrigerator and pour into a large bowl; whisk with an electric mixer.
4. Add in coconut sugar and stir everything together.
5. Top hot chocolate with whipped cream and enjoy!
